title: BRIEF-Bounty Mining Says Signed Facility Agreement For A$90 Mln Refinancing Transaction
text:
BRIEF-Bounty Mining Says Signed Facility Agreement For A$90 Mln Refinancing Transaction

Commodities 55 minutes ago (Oct 07, 2019 22:30)

BRIEF-Bounty Mining Says Signed Facility Agreement For A$90 Mln Refinancing Transaction Oct 7 (Reuters) - Bounty Mining Ltd : * SIGNED A FACILITY AGREEMENT FOR A A$90 MILLION REFINANCING TRANSACTION WITH QCOAL BOUNTY HOLDINGS PTY LTD * FACILITY AGREEMENT PROVIDES FOR CASH FUNDING OF A$60 MILLION AND A GUARANTEE FACILITY FOR A$30 MILLION * UNIT BOUNTY COOK PTY LTD TO ENTER INTO COAL OFFTAKE AGREEMENT WITH QCOAL

BRIEF-Bounty Mining Says Signed Facility Agreement For A$90 Mln Refinancing Transaction
description: BRIEF-Bounty Mining Says Signed Facility Agreement For A$90 Mln Refinancing Transaction
